sections.title: Sleight Of Hand (Dex; Trained Only; Armor Check Penalty)
sections.anchor_heading: # Sleight Of Hand (Dex; Trained Only; Armor Check Penalty)
sections.description: Covers the Sleight of Hand skill mechanics including DCs, common uses like pickpocketing and hiding objects, drawing hidden weapons, entertaining, and skill unlock abilities for high-rank characters.
